resources.string: Thank you for using Eva Moments
Would you like to create a show? Please say yes or no.
Great. Here is a list of shows you can watch.
Hello Stu. Would you like to see a show? Please say yes or no.
Speak in 3 key words to orally recall this show.
Speak a 10 second comment to greet or say hello to the person watching this show.
Congratulations! You successfully created an Eva show
Congratulations! You successfully modified the Eva Show
Hello ! Let\'s get started and create a show. Select one or more images from your camera roll.
Would you like to attach a photo of yourself? Please say yes or no.
Would you like to change order of the contents? Please say yes or no.
Do you want to make any changes? Please say yes or no.
Your show has been saved. Do you want to add another show? Please say yes or no.
No shows were found. Do you want to create a new show? Please say yes or no.
Do you want to make changes to the Keywords or Prelude? Yes or No
Let\'s get started and create a show.
